description: Quadricepsplasty for knee extension contracture secondary to prior femur/knee fracture or surgery (Evidence: pg no: 12, L562-L566)
scope: Treatment of knee extension contracture (Evidence: pg no: 12, L561-L566)

documentation: Knee flexion less than 90 degrees (Evidence: pg no: 12, L564)
Failure of at least 12 weeks of conservative management (Evidence: pg no: 12, L565)
Failure of an arthroscopic lysis of adhesions (Evidence: pg no: 12, L566)

codes.description: Quadricepsplasty (eg, Bennett or Thompson type) (Evidence: pg no: 16, L697)
